name: This is So Evil
author: HellQuyncy
notes: Never tried GB before this season due to who knows why. Found this masterpiece combining GB with Weevil watching Uchiha Leandro YT channel and just adapted it to what I think is the optimized version of it. Really strong, consistent and fun to play with. Played like 20 games and just 1 brick that ended in a win, since even when you brick u can still comeback.
